DOC.brief_summary: According to data from high volume Centres, documentation of entry block with the Achieve catheter may be possible in only about to 50% of pulmonary veins. The investigators aim to assess strategies using the Achieve catheter that can improve this performance.
DOC.brief_title: Cryoablation of AF: Improving the Use of the Achieve Catheter
DOC.criteria: all consecutive patients undergoing atrial fibrillation cryoballoon ablation monitored with the Achieve catheter. patients in AF at the beginning of the procedure patients with a previous AF ablation procedure
